name: Sus Marathon Runners- Desert Map
description:
--------------------------------------INSTRUCTIONS------------------------------------

1) Press space to start the game.

2) Press space whenever the cactus comes or else you becomes dead rat.

3) I made this one mobile-friendly.

Fun Fact: You cannot jump over when the three cactuses come together. The distance is a little too much for the fat boi.

-----CREDITS-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to ScratchTeam (on youtube) for the tutorials. I merged a couple of them together to make this game.

Thanks to Sundar Pichai (CEO of google) for inspiring me during the creation of this game. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
